Calculate selection intensity for single-nucleotide variants and amino acid changes

Source: R/ces_snv.R
ces_snv.Rd

Calculate selection intensity for single-nucleotide variants and amino acid changes

ces_snv(
  cesa = NULL,
  genes = "all",
  cores = 1,
  include_genes_without_recurrent_mutations = F,
  find_CI = T
)

Arguments

cesa

CESAnalysis object
cores

number of cores to use
include_genes_without_recurrent_mutations

default false; will increase runtime and won't find anything interesting
gene

which genes to calculate effect sizes within; defaults to all genes with recurrent mutations in data set

Value

CESAnalysis object with selection results added for the chosen analysis

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
